patthana21.44:1.1_0: Nalokiyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.44:2.1_0: Nalokuttaraṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.44:3.1_0: (Gaṇitakena gaṇetabbā tīṇi pañhā. Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana21.44:4.1_0: Nalokiyaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo anidassanasappaṭigho …. (Tīṇiyeva pañhā kātabbā. Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana21.44:4.1_1: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.44:5.1_0: Nalokuttaraṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ,
